eidolons.name: Turn the Tables
eidolons.desc: When struck by a killing blow after entering battle, instead of becoming knocked down, Arlan immediately restores his HP to 25% of his Max HP. This effect is automatically removed after it is triggered once or after 2 turn(s) have elapsed.

skillTree.name: Revival
skillTree.desc: If the current HP percentage is 30% or lower when defeating an enemy, immediately restores HP equal to 20% of Max HP.

skillTree.name: Endurance

skillTree.name: Repel
